title: Destruction Particles
description: Sets the particles that will be used when block is destroyed. This component can be omitted.

texture.title: Texture
texture.description: The texture name used for the particle.

tint_method.title: Tint Method
tint_method.description: Optional, tint multiplied to the color. Tint method logic varies, but often refers to the rain and temperature of the biome the block is placed in to compute the tint.
